TopicTitle: I just took the best screenshot EVAR

Articles.Content:
Seriously, it is that awesome. There he is, Thrillmaster Jeb, literally LAUGHING as his fellow crewmember dissolves in flame and debris.

That\'s all. I made a seriously imbalanced rocket, and boy was it fun.
This is a fine example of why the game waiting for input before going to the final briefing window after a crash/explosion/dunk/etc is a good thing. Seeing the whole thing would be Awesome!
They\'re both laughing, at Bill, for leaving his seat just before the main event (crash).
Seeing bob exactly sharing Jeb\'s feelings at this time made me laugh. Seriously.

This made me laugh ! But how did you get a so big explosion ring ?

I would like an 'IL-2-like' pause, where you can move the camera when paused ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Wait, are you guys running 0.15 cause I am running it and I have to press recap when I die to show the end briefing screen 0\_0
Do you mean 'echap' ? Since I don\'t know the 'recap' key

> 
> Wait, are you guys running 0.15 cause I am running it and I have to press recap when I die to show the end briefing screen 0\_0

You can move around the camera and enjoy the explosions now (althrough I sometimes spamhit space to escape and it opens the screen on keyboard input).

if you just left-click on .15 after a crash, you\'ll get the flight log... or press any key - that works too...

but you can still pan around with the RMB before that, anyways :![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
